title: Drawing, Project: The elevation of a Victory monument, ca. 1820
title_raw: Project: The elevation of a Victory monument
provenance: Piancastelli Collection. Purchased from general funds from Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Vertical rectangle. Similar 1901-39-2190.  The standing figures beside the lateral seated ones are omitted. Women are seated.  That at the front is flanked by Barbars.  The pedestals of the panoplies have been heightened and they show figures in relief.  Proportions have been changed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Project: The elevation of a Victory monument, ca. 1820. Pencil. Brush, various watercolors. Paper.. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7183
